attributes.action: Make it law that should a person be found guilty of committing a serious crime against another person then that offender shall have his/her Human Rights suspended until such time released.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make it law that should a person be found guilty of committing a serious crime against another person then that offender shall have his/her Human Rights suspended until such time released.

rejection.details: It is not possible to understand what you mean by "Human Rights". Can you be more specific?
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
